rainfalls: As of today, there is no Heavy Rainfall Warning Issued.
thunderstorms:
Thunderstorm Advisory No. 2 #NCR_PRSD

Issued at: 7:45 AM, 05 July 2025(Saturday)



Moderate to heavy rainshowers with lightning and strong winds are expected over Pampanga, Tarlac, Bulacan and Quezon within the next 2 hours.



The above conditions are being experienced in Bataan(Morong) and Zambales(Olongapo, Subic, San Antonio, Castillejos, San Marcelino, Botolan, Iba) which may persist within 2 hours and may affect nearby areas.



All are advised to take precautionary measures against the impacts associated with these hazards which include flash floods and landslides.



Keep monitoring for updates.
